frontmatter.title: TypeScript Typelevel Tic-Tac-Toe: Overkill edition!
frontmatter.description: The TypeScript typesystem is very powerful! Powerful enough to build a fully functioning, dynamically sized, Tic Tac Toe Game with a UI displaying the state of the game.
